Sentencas: Ceramic based compressive seal is regarded as an option for sealing the planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack.
Titulo: Improvement of sealing performance for Al2O3 fiber-reinforced compressive seals for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: However, during the practice of SOFC stack testing, the powder-based seals are found to have weakness in keeping mechanical integrity.
Titulo: Improvement of sealing performance for Al2O3 fiber-reinforced compressive seals for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In consideration of enhancing mechanical properties, ceramic fibers are added to the powder-based seals and the relationship between sealing performance and the content ratio of the ceramic fiber under different inlet gas pressure is investigated.
Titulo: Improvement of sealing performance for Al2O3 fiber-reinforced compressive seals for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The seal containing 20 wt% ceramic fiber (F20) is found to have the best sealing performance.
Titulo: Improvement of sealing performance for Al2O3 fiber-reinforced compressive seals for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The leakage rate can be maintained at about 0.01 sccm/cm at 750 degrees C during 10 thermal cycle testing.
Titulo: Improvement of sealing performance for Al2O3 fiber-reinforced compressive seals for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The interface between the seal and adjacent components exhibits good contact conditions and chemical compatibility which can effectively avoid the formation of interface leakage paths.
Titulo: Improvement of sealing performance for Al2O3 fiber-reinforced compressive seals for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Introducing the ceramic fiber reduces the tensile strength of the seal but enhances ductility and thus improves the reliability and structural integrity of the seal.
Titulo: Improvement of sealing performance for Al2O3 fiber-reinforced compressive seals for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The applicability of the F20 composite seal is verified in a SOFC 1-cell stack testing.
Titulo: Improvement of sealing performance for Al2O3 fiber-reinforced compressive seals for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell
